pkg.name: grouped-fields
pkg.title: Grouped fields
pkg.description: The Grouped fields component allows two closely related form inputs to be grouped together.

scope.title: Grouped fields
scope.description: The Grouped fields component allows two closely related form inputs to be grouped together.

relatedComponents.name: autocomplete
relatedComponents.title: Autocomplete
relatedComponents.description: Autocomplete, also known as type-ahead, uses predictive text to help select options as a user types.

relatedComponents.name: combobox
relatedComponents.title: Combobox
relatedComponents.description: This component allows users to select from a list of options. It’s especially useful when there are many options to choose from.

relatedComponents.name: date-picker
relatedComponents.title: Date picker
relatedComponents.description: The Date picker component allows users to select a single date via a calendar or text input.

relatedComponents.name: password-input
relatedComponents.title: Password input
relatedComponents.description: The password input component allows users to securely enter a password. The text is obscured by default, but can be revealed by pressing the ‘Show password’ checkbox.

relatedComponents.name: search-input
relatedComponents.title: Search input
relatedComponents.description: Search input enables users to enter a word or phrase to find relevant content.

relatedComponents.name: select
relatedComponents.title: Select
relatedComponents.description: Select provides a way for users to choose one item from a collapsible list. It helps reduce input errors and screen space.

relatedComponents.name: text-input
relatedComponents.title: Text input
relatedComponents.description: This component allows users to enter free-form text.

relatedComponents.name: textarea
relatedComponents.title: Textarea
relatedComponents.description: A text area lets users enter long-form, plain text over multiple lines and is commonly found in forms.
